title: Itsutsu no Hako no Monogatari
description:
1: The Setting Sun
An art dealer deals with the impending death of a promising young artist.

2: Always a Holiday with You
A high school student’s fantasy becomes reality in an unexpected way.

3: Pandora's Elevator
Company politics interferes with the lives of two businessmen.

4: Coffin Under the Snow
After twelve years, young man returns to his home town and uncovers the secrets of his father’s past.

5: A Warm Box
A college student is obsessed with abandoned cardboard boxes.

6: I Want to See You at the Library
7: A Cloudy Day in Spring
8: Strange Guys
9: Our Season

matches.title: There Is No Way a Pretty Virtual Girl Is a Girl!
